justification: "Participants made a series of choices ... in a standard 'Monetary Choice Questionnaire' (MCQ)."
"After each decision in the MCQ, participants answered the following question on a 6-point scale ... 'How confident are you that the choice you made was the right one for you?'"

topic_or_construct: subjective time-discounted value of delayed rewards
justification: "Participants completed the 'Bidding task' ... 'I feel that receiving $25 in 98 days would be about the same as receiving $___ today'. We take responses to this Bidding task as an estimate of the value of each LL reward given its delay."
